name: Just Dance 2016 & Just Dance Disney Party 2
summary:
Get ready for double the Just Dance! Save $20 with this Just Dance 2016 and Just Dance Disney Party 2 bundle - perfect for the whole family. 

Just Dance 2016 features an amazing tracklist with visuals that are more creative and breath-taking than ever before. Bust a move to hot hits and fun favorites, including:
- "Same Old Love" by Selena Gomez
- "Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars
- "Blame" by Calvin Harris ft. John Newman
- "Hey Mama" by David Geutta ft. Nicki Minaj, Bebe Reha, & Afro Jack
- "Born This Way" by Lady Gaga
- "Animals" by Martin Garrix

And, dance like the stars from the most popular Disney Channel shows and movies with Just Dance Disney Party 2, featuring tracks from Descendants, Teen Beach 2, Liv and Maddie, Girl Meets World, and more! With a great selection of family favorite songs, fun dances, and kid-friendly gameplay, children of all ages can dance along with family and friends.

esrb.synopsis: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
